item.title: Extending Claude with External Tools: MCPs in Action
item.description: Learn how Model Context Protocol (MCP) breaks through Claude's knowledge limitations by enabling real-time web search and external tool integration through the desktop application. Link to article: https://goatreview.com/extend-claude-model-context-protocol/
